title: Honoring the Victims of the Tragedy in Minneapolis, Minnesota
summary: The document is a presidential proclamation issued on August 27, 2025, honoring the victims of a tragedy in Minneapolis, Minnesota. The proclamation orders the U.S. flag to be flown at half-staff at various federal buildings, military posts, and embassies abroad until sunset on August 31, 2025, as a mark of respect for the victims of the senseless acts of violence.
